name: Smoked Old Fashioned
preparation:
Spice up the Old Fashioned by bringing in smoke and single malt. This spin on the traditional recipe will make you fall in love with the classic all over again.

Add all ingredients to mixing glass filled with ice and stir until cold.

Smoke is added to the wine glass after the cocktail is strained into the glass.

Smoke is added via a smoke gun such as this.
